subject: Broken Clutch!
description_text:
Hello,

     My name is Daniel Gavrich. I just recently ordered and received the
SIMSONN plus X Pedals. (Plus X-P3-H3-Plate)

     My purchase was through amazon. However the clutch pedal never seemed
to work since i got it, i realized today that the wire was split where the
connectivity goes. I assume this is from Shipping etc, I’ve had them for
less than a month (July 6th) i can return the entire set up through amazon,
however i’m very interested in just a replacement clutch pedal is this
possible??
Thank you for your time and response in advance. If you need further
information please let me know.
